DESCRIPTION: Select a custom background picture for your profile.
EXTENDED_LINE_1: **{{prefix}}background** ~ Opens interactive menu with all available backgrounds.
EXTENDED_LINE_2: **{{prefix}}background [CategoryName]** ~ Opens menu with all available backgrounds of that category.
EXTENDED_LINE_3: **{{prefix}}background [BackgroundID]** ~ Quick selects the background with that ID.
SELECTION_TITLE: Type the number for your custom background selection.
SELECTION_FOOTER: Please select a background by number or cancel with [q]uit.
INVALID: There is no background with the ID {{id}}!
PREVIEW_DESCRIPTION: Do you really want to select that background? Please use one of the reactions to take action:
SAVED: You have successfully changed your background. Loading your profile now...
VIP_THEME: Sorry, but the dark theme is only for VIP subscribers. If you want to become VIP, please pledge to our [Patreon](https://www.patreon.com/g4m3r).
VIP_BACKGROUND: ⭐ That background is only for VIP subscribers. If you want to become VIP please pledge to our [Patreon](https://www.patreon.com/g4m3r).
UNLOCKABLE: Background #{{id}} is not unlockable with currency.
NEED_MONEY: You do not have enough Gamer Gold to buy this background. This background costs {{cost}} and you only have {{currency}}. You need {{needed}} more Gamer Gold.
BOUGHT: You just bought the #{{name}} background pack. You can now use the background command to equip your backgrounds.
